# Nuxt Custom Config Schema 

# `appConfig`

## `nuxtIcon`

### `size`
- **Type**: `string | false`
- **Default**: `"1em"`

> Icon Size


Set the default icon size. Set to false to disable the sizing of icon in style.


### `class`
- **Type**: `string`
- **Default**: `""`

> CSS Class


Set the default CSS class


### `aliases`
